page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO AREA
page.content: Our area is situated to the{North of {London,}approximately fifteen miles from the centre of London. It is on the edge of the metropolis, and a section of it is within the{Green {Belt. Over the last ten years the area has been undergoing many major changes. These include large{housing estates being built (part of the{East London {re-housing development),}and most recently the building of the{M25.}(The London Orbital Motorway). Both of these developments have had a major impact on this area. The area also includes many green spaces and an abundance of water (a canal and the{River Lea}). Parts of these areas have been developed for recreational purposes. Our area is partially urban and partially rural.
